subject: Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
I will like to draw your attention to a business opportunity that may
interest you.I'm writing you on behalf of Globalreourceaid, with the
wake a Covid-19, lots of young individual has inherited huge wealth in
their care and their families are desperate to secure safe businesses
model to invest in.should you have an existing business model with
profitability potential,
kindly contact 
mariaelburg@rediffmail.com
 for further details and discussion.
Warm Regard
Maria Elburg

subject: Re: Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Maria Elburg,

Thank you for your email and the business proposal. I am always open to new opportunities and would be interested in learning more about this potential investment. 

Could you please provide more details about the nature of the business, the amount of investment required, and what would be expected from me as a potential investor?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nicole
